name: VIST
overview:
VIST, which was set up in 1997 is growing quickly and proves straight away to be an extremely dynamic and innovative world. Vist imposed itself on an international level thanks to the famous racing plates, which are currently used by the most important World Cup athletes, and today its production comprises other high-end products, such as performing and fashion ski apparel, winter boots and shoes, skis and bindings. The collaboration with the best international athletes, the thorough knowledge of the sector, the continuous search for the most exclusive design and the most innovative and technological materials, together with a careful and critical eye kept on the ultimate trends have turned Vist, fifteen years after its foundation, into a steady reference point for athletes, ski enthusiasts and trend setters.

MISSION We are a young Italian company, unique of its kind, which stakes on the combination of refined design with high quality, in order to create innovative products for the ski world. The passion for sport, the enterprising attitude, as well as the continuous search for solutions aimed at meeting the needs of the user, have led our team to grow and establish itself in the market. Constant investments for the development of exclusive products, which feature utmost functionality and are able to achieve high performance, are the core of our corporate philosophy.

acquisition.source_description: Trademarks of VIST and Bailo will live on
